title: Trump plans crackdown on left-wing groups after Charlie Kirk shooting
shortDescription: After the Charlie Kirk assassination, the Trump administration is planning to use "every resource" to target left-wing groups they say are violent.

title: Watch live: Trump to sign presidential memorandum at White House
shortDescription: The president is scheduled to sign a presidential memorandum on Monday, Sept. 15, though the White House has not clarified what the document addresses.

title: Maureen Comey sues Trump administration over firing
shortDescription: The daughter of former FBI director James Comey said in a federal lawsuit that she was not provided any cause for her removal.

title: Trump boosts funds for HBCUs, tribal schools, amid deep education cuts
shortDescription: The Department of Education plans to reallocate millions to historically Black colleges and tribal schools, amid cuts to minority program grants.

title: Trump vows tough action after grisly beheading of Dallas motel manager
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said "the time for being soft" on illegal immigration is over after the beheading of motel manager Chandra Nagamallaiah.

title: Trump threatens to federalize DC over ICE cooperation
shortDescription: Trump threatened to federalize DC after Muriel Bowser said she does not expect the MPD to work with ICE on immigration enforcement.

title: U.K. police heighten security ahead of Trump's visit to London
shortDescription: President Trump arrives in Britain on Tuesday for a second state visit that includes a customary display of royal pageantry at Windsor Castle.

title: Trump officials mourn Charlie Kirk
shortDescription: Trump officials mourned Charlie Kirk at a vigil at the Kennedy Center, remembering his impact on the MAGA movement.

title: Pete Buttigieg: Biden 'should not have run' for president in 2024
shortDescription: Former Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg said that former President Joe Biden shouldn’t have run for president in 2024.

title: Trump hints at TikTok deal. What he said.
shortDescription: The next TikTok ban extension is set to expire on Sept. 17, unless a deal is reached.

title: What happened in Trump's second assassination attempt? It was a year ago
shortDescription: A second apparent attempt on Donald Trump's life happened a year ago on Sept. 15. Ryan Routh is sitting trial with unusual proceedings. What to know.

title: Haitians in limbo as Trump administration tries to end status early
shortDescription: Haitians on temporary status soon to expire face a tough choice: stay here illegally, go home to a perilous situation or start over in a new country.

title: President Trump says Barron Trump is 'very hurt' by Charlie Kirk's death
shortDescription: President Donald Trump recalled Barron Trump wanting to meet Charlie Kirk, who co-founded the student organization Turning Point USA.

title: Judge blocks Trump admin's move to end Haitian migrants' protections
shortDescription: Federal ruling keeps deportation protections intact as Trump’s plan to end TPS for Haitians is deemed premature and unlawful.

title: What is Trump's approval rating and how does it compare across states?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he would send the National Guard to Memphis, Tennessee. What is his approval rating in the state? How does it compare?

title: UK, US to sign multibillion-dollar tech deal during Trump's visit
shortDescription: The agreement aims to bolster US-UK collaboration between trillion-dollar tech sectors, enhancing opportunities for businesses and consumers.
